Statement: If you are reading this message
If you are reading this message, then the worst happen and I am no longer here
There is a secret island where a series of laboratories reside.  The boat can take you there, but you need to know the way.
Find the geyser here on the Wastelands.  Next to them, you'll see a first aid kit.  In it is the map to the island.
But you'll need to bring additional oxygen, because there are no extra supplies on Lab Lands
